name: Utaenai Fairy
nutshell: A story about an online singing star who's afraid to let anyone know who she really is.

name: HuHu
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: When you’re close to me, your breathe sounds so clear. This is a short love story for everyone to enjoy.

name: Elfen Lied (Blu-Ray Bonus)
nutshell: The Elfen Lied Special Side Story is a short manga created by Lynn Okamoto as a collectible extra within the Elfen Lied Blu-Ray release. An 8-page long story, it has not been published in any other languages nor included with releases outside of Japan, where it saw release in 2012, the tenth anniversary of the manga series. It is apparently set not in the manga continuity, but rather, in the anime's, and its timeframe seems to be around that of the OVA episode, perhaps occurring some time after that.

name: Ouji no Kaeru-sama
nutshell: A readjustment of the Grimm fairy tale "The Frog King"

name: The Watchman
nutshell: It began with first contact. In a dystopian world, a silent "watchman" follows and evaluates a gifted young woman.

name: Unfinished
nutshell:
This is a manga/anime inspired, North American comic.
Max wakes up one night, in the middle of a street and quickly realizes he doesn’t know who he is, or how he got there. Soon after, Max discovers that he’s dead, and now residing in a parallel dimension called Tenkumo. In this dimension, Max must discover who he is if he hopes to help the escorts of souls keep balance in the universe. However, the Supreme Overseer, Owari-Rin has grown tired of the continuity of existence, and has set in motion a plan to bring an end to the previously endless cycle of life.

name: Yowamushi Pedal - Spare Bike
nutshell: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!

name: Daydream★Nightmare
nutshell: Meet Kusumi. He views Ichi as his god. He has no interest in real life girls because anime is his life. Meet Ichi. He has a secret that no one knows about, and he fights to hide it from others. He also has a past that seems to be surfacing through his dreams. But what does it mean when a guy promises to protect him by eating the "bad things"? Join Ichi in his adventure to find out about himself, and what his secret really holds.

name: Hongmao and Lantu: Legend of the Seven Swords
nutshell:
Dayong area (modern day Zhangjiajie in Xiangxi region) is a place of grace and beauty. In 347 CE, the leader of Cult of Demons, Heixinhu, attempted to capture the sacred beast Qilin and drink its blood in order to raise his martial art power and take over wulin. Baimao, the father of Hongmao, with six other swords, defeated Heixinhu with the combined strength of Seven Swords.
50 years later, Heixinhu returns, once again putting the world at risk. The only way to defeat the Cult of Demons is to reunite the Seven Swords once more. Hongmao, as a descending of the Seven Swords, must shoulder his ancient responsibility and find the other six swords in order to defeat the Cult of Demons and protect Qilin.
A tale of wuxia heroes, modernized for a new generation of children, now begins.

name: Momoko Manual
nutshell: Momoko the four eyes is in fact a witch. During the day, Momoko seals her true power with the help of a pair of glasses given to her by her mother. If her true identity is discovered by someone other than her fated “soulmate”, Momoko will turn into a cat! Who is the “soulmate” that is fated for Momoko?

name: Butterfly69
nutshell:
Compilation of short stories:


Butterfly69
Butterfly69 is about two music students. There is an extra for this story in Sayuri-hime


Quilt Queen
About the relationship between a fashion designer and a model. There is an extra for this story in Sayuri-hime 3


Beautiful Pain
It's about two sisters that are in love.


Rooftop Miracle


Spicy Sweets
A girl is worried because her rather unusual family is coming to see her.


Butterfly Effect
Sequel to "Butterfly69," Maria and Ageha try to balance their relationship with their careers.

name: Mirai no Yukue
nutshell:
Collection of oneshots.

Katahaba no Mirai
Oneshot from "Mirai no Yukue" collection.
A short one-shot portraying one moment in a couple's life.

name: Touhou - A True Horror Story of Gensokyo (Doujinshi)
Mononote: Edo Shinobi Kagyou
nutshell: Long, long ago in a certain land, the world was disturbed by a "demon". The demon was "deformed" and didn't even stand 6 feet tall. His jet-black eyes sank into the depths of hell. The people seeing the atrocious and blood-starved appearance of this "deformed demon", trembled in fear. In the tenth year of the Kan'ei era (1633), during the early years of the Edo period, one such demon still exists…as to why "deformed", the reason will astonish you!

name: Gin Shio Shoushou
nutshell: On the day of the high school entrance, standing in front of beautiful sakura trees, Siro heard someone asking: "May I take a photo?" Thinking that person wanted to take a photo of the flower, Siro agreed and stepped back, but suddenly that person pressed down the shutter!

name: Above the Heavens
nutshell: Zhou Ming Yu, a college student who possesses the bizarre power called Tiangou [Heavenly Dog], which is targeted by various powerful forces in the warlock world. In order to eradicate the influence of Tiangou [Heavenly Dog] on himself and to find the truth of his father’s death, a mysterious incident that happened more than a hundred years ago in Kunlun Mountain is unveiled….

name: Ochikazuki ni Naritai Manga
nutshell:
Matsubayashi wants to be friends with his prim and proper classmate Miyazen, and unbeknownst to him, the feeling is mutual.
However, being a brash-looking delinquent, he has a lot of trouble communicating with her despite her valiant (and embarrassing) attempts to use references to his favorite media.


Author's Pixiv
Author's Twitter

Not to be confused with the serialized version "Ochikazuki ni Naritai Miyazen-san."

name: Sexadoll
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
One day, a large package arrives for the unsuccessful eromangaka Tamae Tamagoro. He opens it without knowing what to expect, and finds a beautiful, naked woman inside. She calls him "master" and adores him, but she is a "sex doll" or "sex android" for him!　Who sent her to him and for what purpose?　There was a shocking background to this story. The life of Mimame and the "doll," who is working hard on his main job as a manga artist at a cheap boarding house, is involved in one incident after another and ......?

name: A Person With Top Energy
nutshell:
A forbidden proposal between two girls in separate social berths.
However, deeming it appropriate and actually wanting it are two different things.

name: Genghis Khan
nutshell: A biographical account of the famous Mongolian leader Temuchin who united the numerous Mongolian tribes in the 13th century, ultimately becoming titled as Chinggis Khan. It faithfully follows the account given in the historical document, The Secret History of the Mongols.

name: Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight - The LIVE - #2 Transition
nutshell:
The manga version of the theatrical play "Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight - The LIVE - #2 Transition".
Seiran General Arts Institute versus Seisho Music Academy, a revue where they put Starlight on the line, who will win this Cultural Exchange Program!?

name: Eiyuu to Kosodoro
nutshell:
Eiyuu to Kosodoro / The Hero And The Petty Thief
Isaac, an injured and retired Air Force pilot, was once called the "Nobleman of the Skies" because of his brilliant military service. Upon returning home, he meets a boy named Lenny who broke in while it was abandoned. Isaac, who knew the kid was a war orphan, decided to take him in and they started living together. Lenny was initially rebellious but gradually became aware of Isaac. The life for the two was going smoothly… That is until bounty for Lenny was posted around town for a murder incident.

A heart-shaking European Romance title work with two other stories.

Bokutachi wa koushite Hanshokushiteiru / This Is How We Breed
Aishikata wo mitsuketa yo / I've Found A Way To Love

name: A Super Villain Day Life
nutshell:
(Spanish)
¿Alguna vez te has preguntado que hacen los villanos en sus días libres?, Pues esta obra nos responde esa duda.
Aquí seguiremos la vida del malvado Benishark y de sus amigos donde cada uno tiene que lidiar contra su propia heroína las cuales intentaran detener sus planes y salvar a la ciudad de su conquista… aunque quizás las que terminen conquistadas sean ellas.

name: Gohoubi wa Karada de Haratte, Shachou-san
nutshell: Ookami is at the end of his rope trying to find a suitable secretary. In his desperation, he decides to launch the “Rent A Boyfriend” app to enlist the help of Mao, a rental boyfriend. When they meet in person, Ookami realizes that Mao is even more gorgeous than his photos, and finds himself bewitched by the handsome man. Before he can even make sense of what’s happening, Mao’s tongue is in his mouth as they share a passionate kiss. Ookami’s protestations only spur Mao on: “What’s with that scary face? You’re just turning me on even more.” As things escalate, Ookami chides him: “You have no regard for others.” But Mao takes no heed, continuing to work Ookami up into a frenzy… Check out this new, erotic love story between a mistrustful boss and his aggressive boy toy!

name: I Want to Do It, Even If It Hurts
nutshell:
Hayeon has loved her sunbae unrequitedly for a long time. However, he didn't quite see her as a woman. If you want to be technical, she is a junior from the same club and if you want to be a bit more specific, she is a girl from the same workplace. He suddenly declared his need of a partner for a quick and convenient contractual marriage. Hayeon, who couldn't contain the emotions she had held on to for a long time blurted out that she be his partner instead. With her clumsy seduction, she held on to the man’s strong back and pressed her hot lips onto his. It was a provocation from a cheeky junior. Will sunbae* be angry? Or perhaps he will laugh and call me crazy. But the words that came out of his mouth were unexpected

Links:

Official Indonesian Translation
Original Web Novel (kakao)
Webtoon Trailer

name: You, My Double
nutshell: A oneshot by Tsutsui Ituki, published in Yuritra Jump ~Ultra Jump Yuri Anthology~ Vol.3.

name: Gudaguda Ace
nutshell:
It's not Koha Ace! It's not the European Death Front 1945 either! Here comes a new serialization!
(From Kadokawa)

name: 17-sai, Hajimete - Hatsunetsu
nutshell:
Collection of 9 one-shots:

"Ouji-sama wa Midara ni Midareru" by Kayoru: Hadzuki is in love with her childhood friend Yuki, but now he is very cold with her. What secret will Yuki keep?
"Yumeiro Button" by HOSHIMORI Yukimo.
"Waru no Kuchizuke" by KOKORO Ayumi.
"Konna Abunai Kyori" by CHIBA Kozue.
"Amai Tameiki, Binetsu Jikan" by SHIRAISHI Yuki.
"Sensei to Naisho no Gohoubi Kisu" by OOGI Sae.
"Horeta Mon Makke ~!" by HANAMOTO Asami.
"Nande Watashi or Kisu shita no?" by FUJINAKA Chise.
"Mofu * Mofu" by KITAMURA Satoko.

name: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link (IKEHARA Shigeto)
nutshell:
This short manga comes from a Famicom Manga pack-in booklet included with the May 1987 Ninensei edition of Shogakukan’s Shogaku Gakushu Zasshi magazines.
It's sort of tutorial for the game, teaching you things about how to play it through a light choose-your-own-adventure/puzzle format. It’s pretty simple, as it’s aimed at 8-year-olds.
